oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the transient behaviour of an assembly-like production system
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOPALAN, MN
KUMAR, UD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: networks
blocking
assembly-like production system
transient behaviour
integral equations
semi-regenerative processes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An assembly-like production system which has two parallel stations in the first stage followed by a single station in the second stage is analysed to study the various measures of system performance. A mathematical model is developed using semi-regenerative phenomena and system of convolution integral equations satisfied by various state probabilities are obtained. An iterative numerical technique is used to solve the system of integral equations obtained.
